 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 td[class="section-padding-bottom-image"]{
 padding: 50px 15px 0 15px !important;
 }
 /* For grids */
 .max-width-100 { max-width: 100%!important; }

 /* Obsolete */
 .tnp-grid-column {
 max-width: 100%!important;
 }

}



/* Last posts */

 }

 }
}

}

}

}

 }

 font-size: 16px;
}

}

 font-size: 16px;
}

 color: #007bff;
}

/* Html */
.html-td-global p {
 font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
 font-size: 16px;
}


/* Pricing table */
@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-50 {
 width: 50% !important;
 max-width: 50%;
 }
 
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-33 {
 width: 33.333333333333336% !important;
 max-width: 33.333333333333336%;
 }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-25 {
 width: 25% !important;
 max-width: 25%;
 }
}

/* Gallery */
.gallery-medium {
 box-sizing: border-box;
 width: 280px;
 height: 200px;
 max-width: 100%!important;
 overflow: hidden;
 display: inline-block;
 text-align: center;
 padding: 0;
 margin: 5px;
 }

 .gallery-thumbnail-img {
 max-width: 45%;
 }
 .gallery-medium {
 max-width: 100%!important;
 height: auto;
 display: block;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 }
}

 .single-post-gallery img {
 max-width: 40%;
 }

 width: 100%!important;
 }
 .single-post-1-image {

 }
}

 font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
 font-size: 16px;
}

 font-size: 16px;
}

 width: 100%!important;
 }
 .single-post-1-image {
 width: 100%!important;
 display: block;
 }
}

 font-size: 16px;

 table[class="responsive"] { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 img { max-width: 100%!important }
 img[class="responsive"] { max-width: 100%!important; }
 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */
 .fluid { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }
 img[class="fluid"] { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }

 .block { display: block; }

 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 padding: 50px 15px 0 15px !important;
 }

 max-width: 25%;
 }
}

/* Gallery */
.gallery-medium {
 box-sizing: border-box;
 width: 280px;
 height: 200px;
 max-width: 100%!important;
 overflow: hidden;
 display: inline-block;
 text-align: center;
 padding: 0;
 margin: 5px;
 }
@media all and (max-width: 480px) {
 .gallery-thumbnail-img {
 max-width: 45%;
 }
 .gallery-medium {
 max-width: 100%!important;
 height: auto;
 display: block;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 }
}


/* A single full post */

@media all and (max-width: 480px) {
 .single-post-gallery img {
 max-width: 40%;
 }
 .single-post-1-column {
 width: 100%!important;
 }
 .single-post-1-image {
 width: 100%!important;
 display: block;
 }
}



/* Columns */
@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-50 {
 width: 50% !important;
 max-width: 50%;
 }
 
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-33 {
 width: 33.333333333333336% !important;
 max-width: 33.333333333333336%;
 }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-25 {
 width: 25% !important;
 max-width: 25%;
 }
}

/* List */
@media all and (max-width: 480px) {
 .list-text .mobile {
 font-size: 20px;
 }
}

 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */

 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 td[class="section-padding-bottom-image"]{
 padding: 50px 15px 0 15px !important;
 }
 /* For grids */
 .max-width-100 { max-width: 100%!important; }

 /* Obsolete */
 .tnp-grid-column {
 max-width: 100%!important;
 }

}

 }

 }
}

}

}

}

 }

 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */
 .fluid { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }
 img[class="fluid"] { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }

 .block { display: block; }

 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 padding: 50px 15px 0 15px !important;
 }

 }

body { margin: 0; padding: 0; height: 100%!important; width: 100%!important; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%; mso-line-height-rule: exactly;}

img.aligncenter { display: block; margin: 0 auto;}
/* TinyMCE of WP */
.alignleft { float: left; margin: 7px 15px 7px 0px; }
.alignright { float: right; margin: 7px 0px 7px 15px; }
.aligncenter { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }

 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */

table,td { border-collapse: collapse !important; mso-table-lspace: 0pt; mso-table-rspace: 0pt;}
img { border: 0; height: auto; line-height: 100%; outline: none; text-decoration: none; max-width: 100%!important; -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;}
img.aligncenter { display: block; margin: 0 auto;}
/* TinyMCE of WP */
.alignleft { float: left; margin: 7px 15px 7px 0px; }
.alignright { float: right; margin: 7px 0px 7px 15px; }
.aligncenter { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; }
@media screen and (max-width: 525px) {
 .pt-1, .padding-top-15 { padding-top: 15px!important; }
 .pb-1, .padding-bottom-15 { padding-bottom: 15px!important; }
 .responsive { width:100%!important; }
 table.responsive { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 table[class="responsive"] { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 img { max-width: 100%!important }
 img[class="responsive"] { max-width: 100%!important; }
 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */
 .fluid { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }
 img[class="fluid"] { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }

 .block { display: block; }

 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 }

 }

 .responsive { width:100%!important; }
 table.responsive { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 table[class="responsive"] { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 img { max-width: 100%!important }

 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */

 img[class="fluid"] { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }

 }

 table[class="responsive"] { width:100%!important; float: none; display: table; padding-left: 0; padding-right: 0; }
 img { max-width: 100%!important }
 img[class="responsive"] { max-width: 100%!important; }
 /* "width: auto" restores the natural dimensions forced with attributes for Outlook */
 .fluid { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }
 img[class="fluid"] { max-width: 100%!important; width: auto; }

 .block { display: block; }

 td[class="responsive"]{width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }
 td.responsive { width:100%!important; max-width: 100%!important; display: block; padding-left: 0 !important; padding-right: 0!important; float: none; }

 padding: 50px 15px 0 15px !important;
 }

 }

    [body_text] => Hey Amol, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=39-d36b468f23) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

    [body_text] => Hey Somya, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=91-0cddb23be5) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

    [body_text] => Hey Kieran, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=110-f9e83be29f) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary.

    [body_text] => Hey Brijesh, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=222-b8e7440999) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

 max-width: 50%;
 }
 
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-33 {
 width: 33.333333333333336% !important;
 max-width: 33.333333333333336%;
 }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-25 {
 width: 25% !important;
 max-width: 25%;
 }
}

 }

 }

 }
}

 }

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=407-a61722d988) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

    [body_text] => Hey Ian, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=415-9d10ef127d) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=435-62c4a2b803) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=654-1512c81591) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=715-6f9e42a10f) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

    [body_text] => Hey Alber, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=734-3f2bde1ee8) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team 

facebook  twitter  pinterest  linkedin  instagram  twitch

    [from] => Info@fanz.news
    [from_name] => Esports News
)

    [body_text] => Hey Andrian, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=779-a65af14b55) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

    [from] => Info@fanz.news
    [from_name] => Esports News
)

    [body_text] => Hey Sounab, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1117-a6dcb31887) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

    [body_text] => Hey Joshua, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1146-75b22ccae0) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1262-d2e9d7b374) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary.

    [body_text] => Hey Jackson, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1377-3fd2b19c9a) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

 }
}

 }
}

 }

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1430-54e73100f9) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with:

** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary.

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary.

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1671-13c21b341f) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1722-0644a97f9f) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below.

    [body_text] => Hey Yashwant, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1740-af3a1bcfac) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

 max-width: 33.333333333333336%;
 }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:480px) {
 .mj-column-per-25 {
 width: 25% !important;
 max-width: 25%;
 }
}

/* Gallery */
.gallery-medium {
 box-sizing: border-box;
 width: 280px;
 height: 200px;
 max-width: 100%!important;

 display: inline-block;
 text-align: center;
 padding: 0;
 margin: 5px;
 }

 .gallery-thumbnail-img {
 max-width: 45%;
 }

 max-width: 100%!important;
 height: auto;
 display: block;
 margin-bottom: 10px;
 }
}

 .single-post-gallery img {
 max-width: 40%;
 }

 }

 }
}

 }

    [body_text] => Hey Eric, 

Prepare to dominate the leaderboard with Fanz.news  (Fanz.news) , your ultimate Esports HQ! 

No matter your platform, genre, or skill level, we'll fuel your fandom with: 

** Breaking news and juicy gossip: ** Stay ahead of the curve with tournament updates, transfer rumors, and insider scoops. 
** In-depth analyses and pro tips: ** Level up your gameplay with expert strategies, champion guides, and training techniques. 
** Exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes access: ** Get up close with your favorite players, teams, and personalities. 
** Thrilling Esports events and live coverage: ** Be part of the action with real-time updates, highlights, and insightful commentary. 
Ready to confirm your subscription? Kindly click to CONFIRM  (https://fanz.news/?na=c&nk=1780-5cc7bb7f9c) .  If you want to make changes, find the links you need in the footer below. 

The Fanz. news Team

    [from_name] => Esports News
